title.narrative: Utility scale 150MW ground mounted solar PV project for new highway corridor in Maharashtra - India

description.narrative: Demonstrate the new model for Government owned insfrastrcture companies with land assets to repurpose them for renewable energy along with associated revenue streams. This will directly contribute to India's NDC for RE generation.

Maharashtra .Samruddhi Mahamarg' is a greenfield project and will reduce the 700 km travel time between Nagpur and Mumbai by half to 8 hours instead of currently 16 hours. GGGI is helping MSRDC green its electricity consumption as well develop a Renewable Energy portfolio by partnering for atleast 100 MW of solar power installation along the 'Samruddhi Mahamarg'.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04526 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: MSRDC samruddhi 700 KM highway project is accepted/marketed as a green project (net neutral) to offset its energy consumption with producing equal to or more renewable units from the installation.

description.narrative: Project completion report describing MSRDC's own consumption and the energy output envisaged from the project.

title.narrative: Total volume of green growth financing catalyzed with GGGI’s support, disaggregated by public and private investment.

proved the technical and commercial viability of as visioned by MSRDC, an installation of 150MW solar PV (aggregate capacity). Investor commitment secured for the viable business cases with clear revenue stream identified for MSRDC

description.narrative: Technical and financial feasibility completed and debt and equity structure clearly established for the project. Investment mobilization commitment secured for the project.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform decisions on green growth investments.
Future Highway/infrastructure projects in India have a mandatory requirement to be net neutral energy units consumers. This project serves as an example/demonstration of how it could be achieved.
